body: hi, it would be very nice to have refreshInterval attribute in `@Cacheable` annotation

title: Make it easier to inject a non-primary DataSource into the Quartz auto-configuration
body: See [this question on Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49637490/spring-boot-2-0-quartz-use-non-primary-datasource). Offering `@QuartzDataSource` (matching `@LiquibaseDataSource` and `@FlywayDataSource`) is what comes to my mind.

body: [this section of the doc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-boot/docs/current/reference/htmlsingle/#boot-features-external-config-relaxed-binding) is wrong as it doesn't apply the supported format on the prefix (only the property name).
